entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1 except plus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1 except plus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12 except 17 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
